collections.title: Sentinel-2 Top of Canopy (TOC)
collections.description:
[Sentinel-2 Level 2A](https://docs.terrascope.be/#/DataProducts/Sentinel-2/Level2A/Level2A){target='_blank'} product, processed from L1C by Sen2Cor. 
 Use the [Terrascope viewer](https://viewer.terrascope.be/?language=nl&bbox=0.9339867511378304,50.14520994379217,6.207424251137831,51.77292299745045&overlay=false&bgLayer=MapBox&date=2019-02-25T03:17:15.000Z&layer=CGS_S2_RADIOMETRY) to explore the data. 

  This processing level corrects for atmospheric effects to provide a more accurate representation of the surface reflectance. Sentinel-2 TOC data can be valuable for applications such as land cover classification, vegetation monitoring, and urban planning.

collections.title: Sentinel-2 L1C Top of Atmosphere (TOA)
collections.description: [Sentinel-2 Level 1C](https://sentinel.esa.int/web/sentinel/user-guides/sentinel-2-msi/product-types/level-1c){target='_blank'}The Level-1C product results from using a Digital Elevation Model (DEM) to project the image in cartographic geometry. Per-pixel radiometric measurements are provided in Top Of Atmosphere (TOA) reflectances along with the parameters to transform them into radiances.
